snippet: Traveling for funerals and memorial services can become a major concern as people live longer and, in turn, watch close friends and family members die.
abstract: Bereavement travel can be daunting and stressful for older people; grief counselors offer tips on affordable last-minute flights, volunteer agencies that can help with driving and planning an alternative service when attending a funeral is simply not possible.
lead_paragraph: Traveling for funerals and memorial services can become a major concern as people live longer and, in turn, watch close friends and family members die.

headline.main: Dealing With the Dreaded Bereavement Trip
